name: Save new leads from Outgrow to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new lead is created in Outgrow, Make will automatically add that lead to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I3Q8Y-JYs2E2Ol8_VawI7oCGkrwgvlPUwIz_IYJ4e2w/edit?usp=sharing).
